sentences.sContent: These changes alter the intensity of sunlight hitting the Earth at high latitudes, and so affect the extent of glaciation.
sentences.sContent_eng: These changes alter the intensity of sunlight hitting the Earth at high latitudes, and so affect the extent of glaciation.
sentences.sCn: 这些变化改变了高纬度区域的日照强度，由此影响了冰河作用的范围。

sentences.sContent: Besides the Bow Valley, evidence of glaciation also appears in this image south of the lake, in the amphitheater-shaped cirque.
sentences.sContent_eng: Besides the Bow Valley, evidence of glaciation also appears in this image south of the lake, in the amphitheater-shaped cirque.
sentences.sCn: 除了被迷你汪卡湖占据的弓河谷外，冰川作用的证据还可以在南部的圆形冰斗处找到。

words.tran: 受到冰河作用的；冻结成冰的
使冰冻；被冰冻盖；使受冰川作用

trans.tranOther: the process in which land is covered by glaciers, or the effect this process has
